topic.title: zeronet remote gateway setup
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.3 r3550
  * Operating system: ubuntu 16
  * Web browser: chrome
  * Tor status: not available
  * Opened port: ?
  * Special configuration: online serverless cloud
### Step 2: Describe the problem:
I am trying to setup a private zeronet gateway and possibly make it public in the future but for some reason, zeronet client cannot connect. I am using a paperspace machine with static public ip.
#### Steps to reproduce:

python zeronet.py --ui_ip 0.0.0.0

#### Observed Results:

```
- Starting ZeroNet...                                                      │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# curl 184.105.106.108:43110 
[23:09:23] - OpenSSL loaded, version: 01000207F                            │^X^C
[23:09:23] - Version: 0.6.3 r3550, Python 2.7.12 (default, Dec  4 2017, 14:│root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# curl 184.105.106.108:43110
50:18)                                                                     │curl: (7) Failed to connect to 184.105.106.108 port 43110: Connection timed
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609], Gevent: 1.1.0                                        │ out
[23:09:23] - Creating FileServer....                                       │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# ping 184.105.106.108:43110^
[23:09:23] - Creating UiServer....                                         │C
[23:09:23] - Removing old SSL certs...                                     │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# ^C
[23:09:23] - Starting servers....                                          │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# ^C
[23:09:23] Ui.UiServer --------------------------------------              │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# ^C
[23:09:23] Ui.UiServer Web interface: http://0.0.0.0:43110/                │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# ^C
[23:09:23] Ui.UiServer --------------------------------------              │root@ps79tsyk3:/home/paperspace/ZeroNet-master# 
[23:09:24] TorManager Connecting to Tor Controller 127.0.0.1:9051          │
[23:09:24] TorManager Tor controller connect error: error: [Errno 111] Conn│
ection refused in TorManager.py line 190 > _socket2.py line 228            │
[23:09:24] TorManager Disabling Tor, because error while accessing Tor prox│
y at port 127.0.0.1:9050: No connection                                    │
[23:09:25] ConnServer Checking port 29647 using portchecker.co...          │
[23:09:26] ConnServer [BAD :(] Port closed: Port 29647 is closed.          │
[23:09:26] ConnServer Trying to open port using UpnpPunch...               │
[23:09:36] ConnServer UpnpPunch run error: UpnpError: Failed to communicate│
 with igd using port 29647 on local machine after 3 tries. in FileServer.py│
 line 117 > UpnpPunch.py line 349 > UpnpPunch.py line 340  
```

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?
connect to network
